__e: Turns out, what we thought was the end of the world wasn't.
We thought it was due to the change of seasons, but no... 5 days is a lot, there must be a reason.
Guys, listen. The guy we thought was the son of the guy that died wasn't the son of the guy.
Guys, listen. The guy we thought was the son of the guy that died wasn't the son of the guy.
I know when we came here, we thought it would be forever, but... if he's right, we could have a happily ever after.
We thought it was due to the change of seasons, but no... 5 days is a lot, there must be a reason.
We believed in the same fight... that we didn't have to accept the way things were.
Once all of us believed in spending our lives... in the service of something greater than ourselves.
I don't think he was thinking of that for one second. I'm telling you, that's exactly what we believed at the time.
